Plot the result of summariseCohortCount.

Source: R/plotCohortCount.R
plotCohortCount.Rd

`r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

Usage

plotCohortCount(result, facet = c("cdm_name"), colour = NULL, x = NULL)

Arguments

result

A summariseCohortCount result.

facet

Variables to facet by.

colour

Variables to colour by.

x

Variables to use in x axis.

Value

A ggplot.

Examples

# \donttest{
library(CohortCharacteristics)
library(PatientProfiles)
library(dplyr)

cdm <- mockCohortCharacteristics(numberIndividuals = 100)
counts <- cdm$cohort2 |>
  addSex() |>
  addAge(ageGroup = list(c(0, 29), c(30, 59), c(60, Inf))) |>
  summariseCohortCount(strata = list("age_group", "sex", c("age_group", "sex"))) |>
  filter(variable_name == "Number subjects")
#> ℹ summarising data
#> ✔ summariseCharacteristics finished!
counts |>
  plotCohortCount(
    facet = cohort_name ~ age_group,
    colour = "sex",
    x = "sex")

# }
